timeline.message: Better report reasons if the export fails
Remove useDmsImport and dmsImportCreateProcessFolder from project
Simplify method to create export directory

timeline.bodyText: Why do you not create a new exception class as this class has nothing to do with Kitodo.Production export.
timeline.author: henning-gerhardt

timeline.message: Implement its own class of exception

timeline.author: Kathrin-Huber
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,27 @@
+/*
+ * (c) Kitodo. Key to digital objects e. V. <contact@kitodo.org>
+ *
+ * This file is part of the Kitodo project.
+ *
+ * It is licensed under GNU General Public License version 3 or later.
+ *
+ * For the full copyright and license information, please read the
+ * GPL3-License.txt file that was distributed with this source code.
+ */
+
+package org.kitodo.exceptions;
+
+/**
+ * An exception thrown to indicate that an attempt to export a process failed.
+ */
+public class ExportException extends RuntimeException {
+
+    /**
+     * Constructs an {@code ExportException} with the specified detail message.
+     *
+     * @param s the detail message
+     */
+    public ExportException(String s) {
+        super(s);
+    }

timeline.bodyText: if it is unused, remove it
timeline.author: Kathrin-Huber

replies.bodyText: This method overrides a method in a superclass which uses it. Therefore I cannot remove it.
replies.author: matthias-ronge
